name: Phoenix (itch)
description:
"A strange guy finds himself in an old room and try to get out there. To escape from there costs face his memories, fears and losts."

Pretty old one! We made it for Global Game Jam 2014. Includes tons of bugs! :D  https://globalgamejam.org/2014/games/phoenix 

You can play it directly from: http://oyuncini.oyuncdn.com/custom/ggj2014/

-----

Control scheme is little bit problematic.

Arrow keys: Walk

Space (sometimes shift!): Run

-----

Note: Since it's marinate for local presentation we forgot to add subtitles! 

Woman says: "I have to take your paper to finish your discharge (of patient) operation"

And newspaper about some fire incident / including loss of a family.

------
